languages.text: "Одной из первых построек Футфола стала колоссальная статуя {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Целый астероид был использован для создания сей скульптуры, но даже этот колосс не может передать трепета, что каждый верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} испытывает пред Владыкой. Статуя есть центр станции Футфол в той же мере, в какой Император есть центр, сердце Империума. По ходу строительства к статуе постоянно присоединяют новые, меньшие астероиды, чья поверхность превращена в фундамент великолепных дворцов и храмов, а внутренние тоннели предназначены для жизни простолюдинов и черни".

"One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. As construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."
languages.original_text: "Одной из первых построек Футфола стала колоссальная статуя {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Целый астероид был использован для создания сей скульптуры, но даже этот колосс не может передать трепета, что каждый верный слуга {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} испытывает пред Владыкой. traits.locale_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the Emperor. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the Imperium feels before the Master. The statue is the center of the Footfall station in the same way that the Emperor is the center and heart of the Imperium. As the construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."

languages.text: 「フットフォールの最初の建造物のひとつは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の巨大な像であった。この彫刻の制作には小惑星全体が私用されたが、いかなる巨体をもってしても{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実な従者が主人を前に感じる畏敬の念を伝えることはできない。皇帝が帝国の中心であり心臓であるのと同じように、この像はフットフォールの中心地を担っている。建設が進むにつれ、新たに小惑星が像に取り付けられ、その表面は輝かしい宮廷や神殿の基礎となり、内部のトンネルは平民や暴徒たちの住処となる」
languages.original_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. As construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールの最初の建造物のひとつは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の巨大な像であった。この彫刻の制作には小惑星全体が私用されたが、いかなる巨体をもってしても{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実な従者が主人を前に感じる畏敬の念を伝えることはできない。皇帝が帝国の中心であり心臓であるのと同じように、この像はフットフォールの中心地を担っている。建設が進むにつれ、新たに小惑星が像に取り付けられ、その表面は輝かしい宮廷や神殿の基礎となり、内部のトンネルは平民や暴徒たちの住処となる」

languages.text: “这座巨大的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}雕像，是落脚港最早的建筑之一。这座巨大的雕像是用一整颗小行星雕刻而成的，但即使是如此宏伟的雕像，也无法传达出每位{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}忠诚仆人在帝皇面前时，所能感受到的敬畏之情。这座雕像是落脚港的中心，正如帝皇是帝国的心脏一般。随着建设不断推进，无数新的小行星将会被附加到这座雕像上。这些小行星表面会成为辉煌宫殿和庙宇的地基，而内部的隧道则会成为平头百姓的家园。”
languages.original_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. As construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."

languages.text: «Una de las primeras estructuras edificadas en Paso fue una estatua inmensa del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Para la creación de esta escultura se usó un asteroide entero, pero ni siquiera las proporciones de este titán bastan para transmitir la admiración que todo sirviente fiel del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} siente ante su amo. La estatua ocupa el corazón de Paso igual que el Emperador es el corazón del Imperium. Conforme la construcción avanza se añaden nuevos asteroides menores a la estatua para que sus superficies sirvan de cimientos para gloriosos palacios y templos, mientras que los túneles interiores sirven de hogar a la plebe y la chusma».
languages.original_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. As construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."

traits.locale_text: «Una de las primeras estructuras edificadas en Paso fue una estatua inmensa del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Para la creación de esta escultura se usó un asteroide entero, pero ni siquiera las proporciones de este titán bastan para transmitir la admiración que todo sirviente fiel del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} siente ante su amo. La estatua ocupa el corazón de Paso igual que el Emperador es el corazón del Imperium. Conforme la construcción avanza se añaden nuevos asteroides menores a la estatua para que sus superficies sirvan de cimientos para gloriosos palacios y templos, mientras que los túneles interiores sirven de hogar a la plebe y la chusma».

languages.text: « L'une des premières structures édifiées à Castel fut la statue colossale de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. La création de cette statue nécessita un astéroïde entier, mais même ces dimensions titanesques ne rendent pas justice à l'émotion qui submerge chaque fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} devant son maître. Cette statue trône au centre de Castel, à l'image de l'Empereur qui est le centre et le cœur de l'Imperium. À mesure que les travaux se poursuivent, des astéroïdes plus petits sont reliés à la statue. Leur surface servira de fondation à de glorieux palais et temples, et leurs tunnels souterrains feront office de logements pour le petit peuple. »
languages.original_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. Cette statue trône au centre de Castel, à l'image de l'Empereur qui est le centre et le cœur de l'Imperium. À mesure que les travaux se poursuivent, des astéroïdes plus petits sont reliés à la statue. Leur surface servira de fondation à de glorieux palais et temples, et leurs tunnels souterrains feront office de logements pour le petit peuple. »

languages.text: "Eine der ersten Bauten auf Footfall war die riesige Statue des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}. Für diese Skulptur wurde ein kompletter Asteroid verbaut, aber selbst ihre titanischen Ausmaße können nicht die Ehrfurcht vermitteln, die jeder gläubige Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} vor dem Meister empfindet. Die Statue ist das Zentrum von Footfall, so wie der Imperator das Zentrum und Herz des Imperiums ist. Mit fortschreitendem Bau werden neue, kleinere Asteroiden mit der Statue verbunden, deren Oberfläche als Fundament für großartige Paläste und Tempel dient, und in den Tunneln im Inneren finden Bürger und gewöhnliches Volk ein Zuhause."
languages.original_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. As construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."

Die Statue ist das Zentrum von Footfall, so wie der Imperator das Zentrum und Herz des Imperiums ist. Mit fortschreitendem Bau werden neue, kleinere Asteroiden mit der Statue verbunden, deren Oberfläche als Fundament für großartige Paläste und Tempel dient, und in den Tunneln im Inneren finden Bürger und gewöhnliches Volk ein Zuhause."

languages.text: "Binliman'daki ilk yapılardan biri, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} dev heykelidir. Bu eser, koca bir asteroidin tamamı kullanılarak yapılmış olsa da devasa boyutlarına rağmen {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} inanç dolu hizmetkârlarının, Efendilerinin karşısında duyduğu huşuyu yansıtamaz. Nasıl İmparator, İmparatorluk'un merkezinde ve kalbindeyse heykel de aynı şekilde Binliman'ın merkezindedir. İnşa süreci devam ederken heykele daha küçük asteroitler de dâhil edilmiş; yüzeyleri, görkemli sarayların ve tapınakların temelinde kullanılmaya ayrılırken içlerindeki tüneller de sıradan halk ve ayaktakımı için yuva görevi görmüştür."
languages.original_text: "One of the first structures on Footfall was the colossal statue of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. A whole asteroid was used for the creation of this sculpture, but even its titanic proportions cannot convey the awe that every faithful servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} feels before the Master. The statue is the centre of Footfall in the same way that the Emperor is the centre and heart of the Imperium. As construction progresses, new, smaller asteroids are being attached to the statue, their surface serving as a foundation for glorious palaces and temples, and their inner tunnels as home for the commoners and rabble."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'daki ilk yapılardan biri {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un dev heykeliydi. Bu heykel, bir asteroidin tamamı kullanılarak yapıldı ama devasa boyutlarına rağmen {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un inanç dolu hizmetkârlarının, Efendilerinin karşısında hissettiği hayranlığı yine de yansıtamamakta. Nasıl İmparator, İmparatorluk'un merkezinde ve kalbindeyse, heykel de aynı şekilde Binliman'ın merkezindedir. İnşa süreci devam ederken heykele daha küçük asteroitler de dâhil edildi ve yüzeyleri görkemli sarayların ve tapınakların temelinde kullanılırken, içlerindeki tüneller de sıradan halk ve ayaktakımı için yuva görevi gördü."
